block.name: Variable Slider
block.make: $value _$(id)_control = grc_wxgui.slider_$(slider_type)_control( window=self.GetWin(), callback=self.set_$(id), #if $label.eval label=$label, #else label="$id", #end if value=$id, min=$min, max=$max, num_steps=$num_steps, slider_length=$slider_length, ) #set $grid_pos = $grid_pos.eval #if not grid_pos self.Add(_$(id)_control) #else self.GridAdd(_$(id)_control, $grid_pos[0], $grid_pos[1], $grid_pos[2], $grid_pos[3]) #end if
block.doc:
This block creates a variable with a slider. \ Leave the label blank to use the variable id as the label. \ The value must be a real number. \ The value must be between the minimum and the maximum. \ The number of steps must be between 0 and 1000.
Use the Grid Position (row, column, row span, column span) to position the graphical element in the window.
